observation: Pneumatic & Hydraulic Components - Duncan Rogers  Welcome to Duncan Rogers.  | Sign in My Account 0141 882 6211 Need help finding a product? Show Menu Products Pneumatics Hydraulics Brands Quick Order/Quote Engineers' Data Literature About Us Contact Us Delivery Basket Hide Menu Prev Next Offers of the Month New Products Best Selling Products View All Products FREE UK Next Day Delivery on all orders over £240 before VAT.	(25kg limit) Hose Reels This compact, spring rewind hose reel comes with 15 metres of either 3/8" of 1/2" ID hose and is available from stock. BUY NOW OGS Multipurpose Hose This rubber PVC alloy hose is designed for Oil, Grease & Solvent transfer but can also be used in general air & water applications. 10 bar max Black By the metre or in 100m coils Diesel and Petrol Hose 6, 8, 10, 13, 16 & 19mm bore 14 bar rated Available by the metre Adjustable Pressure Switch Suitable for a wide range of applications Ranges covering 0.2 to 400 bar 250V AC max Compressed Air Flow Controls Banjo and inline types BSP connections and push in types Control cylinder speed and many other applications Legris Switch Valve 3/2 and 2/2 versions M5, 1/8” & 1/4” BSP 4, 6, 8 & 10mm push in Aluminium Manifolds Single & double sided M5 up to 1/2” BSP Up to 6 outlets on either side Stucchi Flat Face Hydraulic Couplings According to ISO 16028 1/4” up to 2” BSP Highly competitive Grease Nipples & Grease Guns Comprehensive range No minimum order charge or quantity Useful Tools Need help with your purchase? Consult our conversion charts and engineer information. CLICK HERE Pilot Valve 3/2 5/2 5/3 1/8 1/4 & 1/2 BSP Push In Male Stud BSPP 4 - 16mm od Metric Push In Fitting Kits 4 - 12mm od Metric Equal Push In Plug In Branch Tee 4-16mm od Metric Plug In Reducer Tube Splicer 4 - 16mm od Metric Push In Plug In Y Reducer 4 - 12mm od Metric Equal Push In Plastic Bulkhead Union 4-12mm Hose Tail - Brass BSPT 1/8 - 2.5 PCL Coupling - Standard Airflow & Adaptor Polyurethane Tubing 4-16mm od 25m & 100m Malleable Iron Reducing Bush 1/8 - 2 Hex Nipple Male BSP Malleable Iron Hexagon Nipple 1/8 - 2 Bonded Seals Legris LF3000 push in stud - Male Nylon tube - standard  Metric 4 - 16mm od Olab Push in Stud Elbow 4mm - 12mm Ball Valve Ideal  F/F 1/4 - 2 BSP Malleable Iron Equal Elbow 1/8 - 2 Customer Comments 'We needed fittings for a CNC machine and your website had them all 'under one roof' at competitive prices. It's so much easier to buy our fittings on line from Duncan Rogers.' Stephen Broad, Mid Glamorgan, Wales Security & Payment Options Your online payment will be handled by SecureTrading, the leading independent internet payment processor in the UK. Credit card details are entered on a secure page (https secure padlock). They are fully encrypted using the most sophisticated e-payment software and also incorporate Verified by Visa & MasterCard SecureCode to ensure that your payment is secure. Please complete the form on our contact page info@duncanrogers.com UK International Tel: +44 141 882 6211 Quick Order © 2024 Duncan Rogers | The Duncan Rogers website is owned by Duncan Rogers (Engineering) Ltd.

The domain status is 'ok', and the domain has been recently updated. thought: The certificate information shows that the website is secured with a valid certificate from Let's Encrypt, with the current certificate issued on March 13, 2024, and valid until June 11, 2024. This adds to the legitimacy of the site, as scam sites often do not have valid SSL certificates, or they use self-signed ones. Based on the website content, WHOIS information, customer feedback, social media presence, and valid security certificate, there are no clear indicators of a scam. The company appears to be an established business with a long-standing domain and a presence on social media, which would be unusual for a scam website. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.duncanrogers.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has been registered since 1997 with consistent updates has valid contact information consistent with the stated location displays customer comments and has a social media presence and utilizes a valid security certificate. There are no overt signs of scam activity such as unrealistic claims targeting of psychological weaknesses or non-existent companies. Payment and contact details are appropriate for the business and there is no evidence of unusually low prices or unusual payment methods.
